title: LePlayer Music
subtitle: Music Streaming Revolution
description: An uncomplete music player or streaming service, built on Svelte.

gallery.caption: Clean and intuitive music player interface
Organize your music into beautiful playlists
Share and discover music with your community

content.heading: The Vision
content.text:
LePlayer Music is not just another music streaming platform. It's a revolution in how we consume music while supporting artists fairly.

In an era where every interaction is tracked and monetized, LePlayer Music takes a stand: your listening habits should not be commodified. We're building a platform where users are in control of their data, artists earn fair compensation, and the listening experience is genuinely yours.

content.heading: Join the Revolution
content.text:
We're looking for contributors, beta testers, and artists who believe in a better music ecosystem. Whether you're a developer, designer, musician, or just someone tired of being tracked, there's a place for you in the LePlayer Music community.

Our GitHub repository contains the full source code, and we welcome pull requests, bug reports, and feature suggestions. The project is open source under the LGPL 2.1 license. THIS PROJECT IS STILL IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT AND NOT YET PRODUCTION-READY.
